price: 53. Waxaana ka siinnay Naxariistayada walaalkii Haaruun oo Nabi ah.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحۡمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu min raḥmatinā akhāhu hārūna nabiyyan
